pullrequest.title: Make sure gzserver destroys all callbacks when gzclient exits

content.raw:
The [Subscriber](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/08b0b80c8a74498e5876eac82bf68e1c52ad0e9b/gazebo/transport/Subscriber.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Subscriber.cc-40)'s destructor calls `Unsubscribe`, which uses the node to unsubscribe it in the `TopicManager` and to remove the callback within the node.

Node [Fini](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/08b0b80c8a74498e5876eac82bf68e1c52ad0e9b/gazebo/transport/Node.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Node.cc-50) does clear all callbacks, but it doesn't unsubscribe each subscriber from the topic manager for example.
content.html:
The Subscriber's destructor calls Unsubscribe, which uses the node to unsubscribe it in the TopicManager and to remove the callback within the node.

Node Fini does clear all callbacks, but it doesn't unsubscribe each subscriber from the topic manager for example.
